anime.description: The protagonist, Bottom Biting Bug XVIII (age 10), loves to happily sing and dance more than anything else in the world. When bitten by a Bottom Biting Bug, people with hunched backs will have their posture corrected, depressed people will start to laugh, and people who had no confidence will suddenly become self-assured - those bitten are cheered up until they seem like entirely different people. However, even the Bottom Biting Bug makes many mistakes... This story featuring typical scenes from everyday life will continue to evolve through the sort of humor that kids love. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大騒ぎ!? ドキドキパニックバザー
Chaos?! The Thrilling Panic Bazaar
Oosawagi!? Dokidoki Panic Bazar
episode.summary: Mr. Gab announces that the school will be holding a bazaar to raise money for a school pool, and the students are to bring items from home that they no longer need... but on the day of the bazaar, none of the items brought in are selling well. The principal is disheartened, but a bite to the bottom gives him an idea that could save the bazaar! Will they raise enough to build a school pool?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: つくれ, ご近所マップ!?
Make a Map of the Neighborhood?!
Tsukure, Go Kinjo Map!?
episode.summary: The kids are given a homework assignment to walk around the neighborhood and make a map of the things they find. As they begin their exploration of the town, they come across all kinds of interesting places, like a fruit stand whose owner knows all the town gossip and even a mysterious haunted house. What kinds of maps will they come up with? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: トラック野郎, 爆走ヨロシク!?
The Trucker! Let`s Peel Out?!
Truck Yarou, Bakusou Yoroshiku!?
episode.summary: After a fight with his mom, Fatton runs away from home. As he`s sulking, a trucker comes along and invites Fatton aboard his truck for a drive that proves to be both thrilling and valuable. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オナラは地球を救う, プー2号!?
Farts Will Save the World! Poot No. 2?!
Onara wa Chikyuu o Sukuu, Puu 2 Gou!?
episode.summary: Poot No. 1, the fart-powered robot that Grandpa invented, has made headlines overseas, so Grandpa begins to build Poot No. 2, a rocket-type. He believes that if Poot No. 2 can find a habitable planet, the problem of overpopulation will be solved! The power of farts will save the planet! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 憧れ!? カプリーヌのかぐや姫
Role Model?! Capline`s Princess Kaguya
Akogare!? Capeline no Kaguya-hime
episode.summary: Capline is reading Tale of the Bamboo Cutter: Princess Kaguya, and soon her envy of Princess Kaguya`s popularity and beauty carry her into a fantasy in which she is the legendary Princess Kajiri, born from a shining butt-bamboo shoot. Capline, as Princess Kajiri, is approached by B.B.B., Gabriel, and Fatton for her hand in marriage, so she sends them on impossible quests. But as her popularity grows, so does her ego... What is the fate of Princess Kajiri?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ガブハチ先生, またまた恋!?
Mr. Gab, In Love Again?!
Gabuhachi-sensei, Matamata Koi!?
episode.summary: Mr. Gab can`t stop sighing. He fell in love with a beautiful rich girl and tried to impress her by pretending he was rich too, but now he`s regretting it. Capline tells him that all he needs to do is become rich for real, and promises to transform him! She gives Mr. Gab instructions during his date at a fancy French restaurant, but has trouble following the plan. Will Mr Gab`s love blossom this time?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: KJR, マンマミ~ア!?
KJR, Mamma Mia?!
KJR, Mamma Mia!?
episode.summary: KJR is depressed after being told by his mother, Mamma Mia, to give up on rapping. B.B.B. and friends can`t bear to see him so down, so they decide to help make KJR`s concert a success so Mamma Mia will accept his rapping career! They promote the concert all around town and manage to pack the venue, but the huge crowd gives KJR stage fright! Will he be able to stay a rapper?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チェンジ, ミ~!?
Change, Me?!
Change, Me!?
episode.summary: Grandpa seasons B.B.B.`s dinner with Change Essence, an invention that he claims will make even the spiciest foods taste sweet... but when B.B.B. and Gabriel smell the powder and sneeze, instead of changing the food`s essence, B.B.B.`s essence ends up in Gabriel`s body and vice versa! The two of them have no choice but to live each other`s lives until Grandpa invents a cure. Will they ever return to their own bodies?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ウソでしょ!? さよならかじり屋
You`re Kidding, Right?! Farewell, Bitery
Uso Desho!? Sayonara Kajiri-ya
episode.summary: KJR overhears B.B.B.`s dad telling his mom that he`s going to "quit" and "close up shop." He mistakenly thinks he means they`re shutting down the Bitery forever, and tells everyone in town what he heard. The townsfolk decide to try to help while pretending they don`t know, so they visit the Bitery in droves and offer them snacks and well-wishes. B.B.B. notices everyone is acting strange and tries to find out the truth. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Let`s, Poem!?
Let`s Poem?!
Let`s, Poem!?
episode.summary: The kids have a special lesson on poems at school, and their teacher is B.B.B.`s grandpa. It turns out he`s a "Poem Ambassador" who teaches others the wonders of poems! All the students take interest in poems, and when Grandpa yells "Let`s poem!" they recite their own, one after another. Just then, Grandpa`s old rival, the "Poem Guru," appears. Who will win the poem showdown?! Source: crunchyroll
